item.title: The Apple Watch Ultra 2 is the cheapest I’ve ever seen, thanks to this enormous discount
item.description: I've spent the last six weeks testing Apple Watch Ultra 2's health and fitness features. So believe me: this $250 discount is an amazing deal.

item.title: Waymo Released a Revealing Postmortem on its San Francisco Blackout Meltdown
item.description: It sounds like human remote drivers are still off the table.

item.title: Pluribus season 1 ending explained: will [spoiler] join The Others, is season 2 in the works, and more on the new Apple TV show's latest finale
item.description: Pluribus episode 9 has brought down the curtain on the Apple TV show's first season – and we're here to answer your biggest questions.

item.title: How to watch Carols by Candlelight 2025 — free streams from anywhere
item.description: With the annual Sidney Myer Music Bowl fundraiser set to be headlined by a Lainey Wilson-David Campbell duet, here's how to watch Carols by Candlelight 2025.

item.title: Should you track your family’s location?
item.description: Where I’ve landed on location sharing (and how to disable it). This story first appeared in Advisorator, Jared’s weekly tech advice newsletter. Sign up to get more insights every Tuesday.
